content:
the dead,
then it would seem that we have a divine miracle on our hands and, thus,
evidence for the existence of God.
Now most people would think that the resurrection of Jesus is just some-
thing you believe in by faith or not. But, in fact, there are three established
facts, recognized by the majority of New Testament historians today, which I
believe support the resurrection of Jesus: the empty tomb; Jesus’ postmortem
appearances; and the origin of the disciples’ belief in his resurrection. L
